programme.title: Love Lies
programme.desc: Gynaecologist Veronica downloads a dating app for fun. Little does she know that the charming French engineer on the other end is actually a local con artist named Joe, who is a member of an online scam group. As their fake relationship unfolds, both Joes guilty conscience and Veronicas hopes intensify.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: Old Fox
programme.desc: In 1989, young Liao Jie and his father save for a home, unaware of rising property prices. Frustrated by poverty, he learns from their landlord Old Fox who teaches him survival in society. Liao Jie ends up hurting Old Fox with what he has learnt, but his empathy prevents him from becoming like Old Fox.

programme.title: Bursting Point
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Bang sends Officer Ming undercover to a drug cartel to displace drug lord Yang. A failed raid triggers Yang's rage for revenge. Meanwhile, drug maker Ying Xiu is forced to cooperate with the police and sets a trap for Yang. The battle between the police and the drug cartel has just begun!

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughters diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: The story is about a super standard girl in school, May Who, is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber, Fame, with her new-found friend, Pong. The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Cruel War
programme.desc: To combat the greenhouse effect, scientist Yan Xin attempts to plant newly developed super rubber seeds on a remote island, hoping to transform it into a thriving new land. Yan Xin's ex-husband decides to accompany her on this perilous journey. As conflicts arise, they encounter the local drug cartel, and a fatal battle is about to begin.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Look Up
programme.desc: This film celebrates the 25th anniversary of Hong Kongs Handover in a series of four cultural stories about young Hong Kongers from different walks of life: a young man with autism pursuing his dream, a reconciliation between father and son, a Chinese opera star helping young pop singers, and a Nepali youth becoming a professional lion dancer.

programme.title: Lost Love
programme.desc: Mei tries to get over the death of her young son by becoming a foster parent. For 13 years, Meis dedication to the foster child leads her to neglect her husband and the true needs of the child. It is only through the childs unintentional help that the couple finally manages to salvage their relationship.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Love For All Seasons
programme.desc: May, acting leader of the Er Mei sect, cures the incurable illness of Tiger, a rich playboy. Under the threat of her senior, May seeks help from Tiger to experience heartbreak and master the "Heartbroken Sword" style, so as to defeat her senior and preserve Er Mei sect. Will this strange and long-winding relationship reach a happy ending?

programme.title: The Unwavering Brotherhood
programme.desc: The revered elder of a triad gang faces succession uncertainty when his three trusted underlingsHua, Fei, and Guoare robbed while transporting gang money. Determined to redeem himself, Hua vows to track down the robbers. However, when Hua discovers that Fei and Guo are connected to the robbery, he must choose between loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile Hand of God to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the Hand of God?

programme.title: The Wig
programme.desc: Meng Zhong is a law graduate overwhelmed by despair after failing the bar exam three times and vents his frustration on a drunken passenger one stormy night. Twenty years later, Meng is a successful lawyer, but his investigation into a sexual assault case involving a young girl rekindles haunting memories he cannot escape.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxer
programme.desc: Skilled shadow Tai Chi boxer Ku Ting hides his skills by working as a construction worker. However, when the thugs assaulted his girlfriend, Ku Ting has no choice but to use his kung fu to show his enemies what it takes to keep justice in line.

programme.title: Diary Of A Lady-killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Love With The Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, salesman Bao meets a rich girl, Jin Jin, who just broke up with her boyfriend. Two equally heartbroken strangers fall in love instantly and get married on impulse. The couple lives happily together until Jin Jin finds herself pregnant with her ex-boyfriend's baby...

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Jade Faced Assassin
programme.desc: Two forbidden lovers, Zhang Zhen and Yue Nu, are killed by four villains and left behind their twin babies. Yue Nu's elder sister hopes to restore the clan's honour and separates the twins, arranging for them to be raised by competing clans. 18 years later, the twins meet and fight against each other, bringing chaos to the martial arts world.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: The Golden Seal
programme.desc: Dai Tian Chou practices martial arts since young so he can avenge his father's death. He meets Wu Xiao Yan who is disguised as a man one day and is suddenly beaten by a group of gangsters. Wu begs her father to allow her to take Dai back home to recover. Little does Dai know this is his chance to take revenge.

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Shaolin's Hung falls in love with Fang while escaping the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung's son creates a new form of martial art combining his parents' kung fu styles.

programme.title: Finger Of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous Finger of Doom, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu's enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire's Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father's death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: When The Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Ten Tigers Of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army's help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: Adapted from the classic Chinese novel of the same title, the story follows Monk Tang San Zang's journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: Long Road To Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mu's lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Li's father

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her father's towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chan's family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chan's daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Ming's guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Big Times For The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: The Swift Knight
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor is dying with no heir to succeed the throne. His brother recalls that he has an illegitimate child with a court lady years ago and palace guards are sent to search for the heir. When the Emperor's nephew hires assassins to kill the child so he can be the successor, the Swift Knight comes to the rescue

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: Lover's Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a man's role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru S1 Ep37
programme.desc: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai S1 Ep22
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai S1 Ep23
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.desc: HaGoLa' is the story of three naughty little friends - Lattha, Hathgola and Goli, who live in a unique world of objects.

programme.desc: Guru's onomatopoeic singing talents adds to Bhole's unique dancing style and brute strength which helps them to get out of many sticky situations in this animated musical comedy.

programme.desc: Trash Day - After a New Jersey mayor is kidnapped, the Fugitive Task Force works against the clock to untangle a web of political conspiracies that may aid their investigation. Meanwhile, Rays camping trip with his father and Caleb takes an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return
programme.desc: International action hero Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as Luc Deveraux, the only survivor of the original, ill-fated Universal Soldier project. He has come out of retirement to be the technical advisor on a special government program preparing a new, stronger breed of soldier that is more sophisticated, intelligent and agile. All goes well with the program until the soldiers' supercomputer, SETH (Michael Jai White), develops a mind all its own, and sets in motion a plan that includes killing Deveraux and kidnapping his daughter. With the aide of Erin (Heidi Schanz), a tough reporter in search of her big story, and his partner Maggie (Kiana Tom), Deveraux once again is forced to combat the most lethal army ever developed as he races against the clock to save his daughter and keep his family together.

programme.desc: Kiss the Cod and Make them Die - Jesse and Stellas band gig goes sour when they become the victims of a mass poisoning, becoming key witnesses in piecing together a deadly night at the pub.

programme.title: Anger Management
programme.desc: Conservative businessman Dave Buznik (Adam Sandler) is usually a mild-mannered, non-confrontational guy. But after an altercation aboard an airplane, he is sentenced to an anger management program, only to discover that his instructor, Dr. Buddy Rydell (Jack Nicholson), has a serious anger problem of his own, one that will only fully reveal itself once Dr. Rydell moves into Dave's home to instruct him, hands-on, in the ways of calm behavior.

programme.title: Universal Soldier: The Return
programme.desc: International action hero Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as Luc Deveraux, the only survivor of the original, ill-fated Universal Soldier project. He has come out of retirement to be the technical advisor on a special government program preparing a new, stronger breed of soldier that is more sophisticated, intelligent and agile. All goes well with the program until the soldiers' supercomputer, SETH (Michael Jai White), develops a mind all its own, and sets in motion a plan that includes killing Deveraux and kidnapping his daughter. With the aide of Erin (Heidi Schanz), a tough reporter in search of her big story, and his partner Maggie (Kiana Tom), Deveraux once again is forced to combat the most lethal army ever developed as he races against the clock to save his daughter and keep his family together.

programme.title: Poker Face S2 Ep1
programme.desc: The Game Is a Foot - Charlie Cale takes on an investigation into a seemingly innocent death in a friend's family.

programme.title: Poker Face S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Last Looks - When her new friend disappears from a film set, Charlie must unearth clues at the family-run funeral home that served as the production's most recent location.

programme.title: Poker Face S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Whack-A-Mole - Caught between the mob and the FBI, Charlie must cobble together the truth of who is working for whom, using her talents to find a rat, or possibly a mole.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep7
programme.desc: The Real Deal - Alecs first date with Rose turns into a 24-hour excursion when they find themselves taking on an investigation involving a forged masterpiece. Marisa and Kylie attempt to revive their friendship, which has faltered since Alec and Marisas divorce.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep8
programme.desc: Scorched Earth - Alec takes a case involving a young burn victim and arson that forces him to confront some trauma from his past. Phoebe and Rizwan compete for an important research grant.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep9
programme.desc: Cheating Life - After witnessing a hit and run during a friends livestream, Alec and Kylie aim to prove it wasnt an accident. As Marisa and Jace continue their investigation into the church bombing, they turn their sights on a prominent senator.

programme.title: The Irrational Ep10
programme.desc: Bombshell - Alec and his team come face to face with the man who was put away for the church bombing 20 years earlier. Marisa and Kylie work together to save Alec, Phoebe and Rizwan. Jace makes a critical break in the case that changes everything.

programme.desc: Pilot - Professor of behavioral science Alec Mercer is called upon to investigate the murder of a fashion influencer whose boyfriend, a decorated soldier and son of a Senator, has confessed to the crime. Mercer suspects there is more to the story than meets the eye.

programme.title: Bad Influence
programme.desc: A single mom is overjoyed when her daughter finally makes friends at her new high school. Soon, however, it becomes clear that this group of students follows their own moral code thats strange, self-centered, and possibly dangerous.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome To Spiderwick - When his family moves into the mysterious Spiderwick Estate, Jared suspects they're not alone. Meanwhile, the ogre Mulgarath takes a new form and enacts his malevolent plan.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles Ep2
programme.desc: The Field Guide To The Fantastical World Around You - Jared enlists Simon, Mallory and a suspicious new ally to set traps for the creature in the Spiderwick Estate. Helen leads the search for Aunt Lucinda and grows closer to the enemy.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles Ep3
programme.desc: I Will Survive - Jared and Simon find their first field guide page and make unexpected friendships in the process. Mallory struggles to find her footing in Henson while Helen deals with her visiting mother.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles Ep4
programme.desc: Tastes Like Chicken - Jared and Simon capture Thimbletack but cant agree on whether they can trust the boggart. Bree encourages Mallory to throw a party at the Spiderwick Estate to meet other kids in town.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles Ep5
programme.desc: A Midsummer's Daydream - Simon runs away to New York to seek his fathers guidance, bringing Calliope for moral support. Jared and Thimbletack team up to find the dragon page in a race against Mulgarath.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles Ep6
programme.desc: 1028 Teeth - Mallory and Jared team up to find the Vorpal Sword, the only weapon that can stop Mulgarath. Simon and Calliope get desperate trying to save the dragons Mulgarath put them in charge of.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles Ep7
programme.desc: The Field Guide To Jared Grace - Mulgarath holds Jared captive in Meskwaki, determined to find the location of the dragon page. Jared has met his match in the ogre, falling victim to his manipulation.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles Ep8
programme.desc: The Wrath Of Mulgarath - Jared, Simon and Mallory must reconcile to save Helen and all of Henson from Mulgaraths insatiable appetite. Jared learns to accept his flaws and see them as strengths.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: A man left for dead goes after the Eastern European mob boss who killed his wife and daughter by infiltrating his gang and killing them off one by one, while sending clues to let him know he is coming.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant colony planet has a malfunction in one of its sleep chambers. As a result, a single passenger is awakened 90 years before anyone else.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: Smurfette and her friends go to the Forbidden Forest to find a lost village. When the evil wizard Gargamel gets to know of this, he devises a plan to stop the smurfs from discovering the town.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Battle For The Heartfire
programme.desc: Drago, a dragon who shares his heart with the king of Brittania, must find an heir to the throne when the king passes. But the potential heirs use their inherited dragon strength and fire power against each other to vie for the throne.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Columbus, Tallahassee, and Wichita embark on a journey to find Little Rock, while dealing with a horde of super-zombies migrating from city to city and destroying everything in their wake.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Tom Hanks reprises his role as Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon, who once again finds that forces with ancient roots are willing to stop at nothing, even murder, to advance their goals.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit, the mischievous and adventurous hero who has captivated generations of readers, now takes on the starring role of his own cute, contemporary comedy with attitude.

programme.title: Dead Man Down
programme.desc: A man left for dead goes after the Eastern European mob boss who killed his wife and daughter by infiltrating his gang and killing them off one by one, while sending clues to let him know he is coming.

programme.title: Avengers Confidential: Black Widow & Punisher
programme.desc: The Punisher teams up with Black Widow on a high-stakes mission to stop Leviathan, a terrorist organization, from selling stolen S.H.I.E.L.D. technology to the highest bidder, saving the world and the Avengers.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: An American backpacker gets involved with a ring of drug smugglers as their driver, though he winds up on the run from his employers across Munich's high-speed Autobahn.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: After chimps infected with a deadly rage virus are freed, a global pandemic nearly wipes out humanity. A small group of survivors, led by Jim (Cillian Murphy), must navigate desolate London and find hope amidst the chaos.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: Maersk Alabama, an unarmed US container ship, gets hijacked by Somali pirates, led by Abduwali Muse, en route to Kenya. The ship's captain and Muse soon are at the mercy of uncontrollable forces.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Chris joins his girlfriend Rose for a weekend at her familys estate. At first, their warm welcome seems like awkwardness about their interracial relationshipuntil disturbing truths emerge.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: When the old-old-old-fashioned vampire Vlad arrives at the hotel for an impromptu family get-together, Hotel Transylvania is in for a collision of supernatural old-school and modern day cool.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is magically hurtled through space.

programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Danube: Europe's Mightiest River S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Budapest - In Budapest Joanna explores the river by boat and rides a unique children's railway, as well as discovering the city's Jewish heritage.

programme.title: Planet Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Deserts - Desert covers 30 per cent of the Earth's surface, but lack of rain does not lead to a dull existence as flowers bloom in the most unexpected places.

programme.title: Inside Our... Minds S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Dyslexia - It's thought that up to 1 in 10 people in the UK are dyslexic, making it the most diagnosed type of neurodivergence. Despite this, Chris feels dyslexia is frequently ignored and often misunderstood.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S11 Ep11
programme.desc: Morocco - Ben heads to the African continent to visit former army officer Mark, who, over 17 years, built a stunning home on the Moroccan coast.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Marvel at a recording studio that turned an outdated vessel into a boat that really rocks, then travel to a high-end hotel with a catch: it used to be a prison.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep3
programme.desc: See how Caribbean-inspired candy bars are made, and irresistible polenta crisps, or a maple Danish. And watch how Alfredo risotto is made - a risotto so popular that more than 25 million are produced per year.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep4
programme.desc: See an organic spin on the classic cheese twist, or millions of bite-size mint chocolate patties. Plus, how 200 litres of vodka a month puts the zing in a special pasta sauce.

programme.title: Race Across the World S5 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 5 - Five intrepid duos race over 14,000km across Asia, the world's largest continent.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 1 - See how Britain's National Gallery, The Tate, stepped in to help the Bankside on the southern shore of the River Thames.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Montana - Glacier National Park - With its pristine forests, alpine meadows and rugged mountains, Glacier National Park in Montana is a world like no other. Ryan Pyle dons his snow-boots and embarks on an epic trek across this snowy and isolated landscape with its formidable peaks.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Simon travels through Brazil, from the heart of the Amazon rainforest to the coast and the glamorous-but-troubled city of Rio de Janeiro.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S11 Ep11
programme.desc: Morocco - Ben heads to the African continent to visit former army officer Mark, who, over 17 years, built a stunning home on the Moroccan coast.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 1 - See how Britain's National Gallery, The Tate, stepped in to help the Bankside on the southern shore of the River Thames.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Linear Oasis - Follow the course of South Africa's Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way we encounter a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies; this is the story of the Linear Oasis. We reveal how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - It's spring: the season of courtship and new life. Witness nature awaken from its slumber in many forms, from the blossoms that explode in the rain-soaked desert of Arizona to the fuzzy wood ducklings that leap from their nests.

programme.title: America's Wild Seasons S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer brings long, warm days for wildlife to thrive. Watch animals learn new skills, compete for mates, and escape predators as they try to make the most of the short season.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Scent Detectives - A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue S2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlotte's tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Linear Oasis - Follow the course of South Africa's Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. programme.title: Animal Senses S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Sight - Seeing the world is one of the most amazing animal adaptations. Different types of eyes give animals different types of vision, and in some cases they can be extraordinary.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Scent Detectives - A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mvula's Journey - Mvula is the youngest calf in the Madzi family. Temperatures are soaring. Lagoons and waterholes are drying up. This forces Mvula and his family to undertake a long and dangerous journey to the only remaining source of water: the Luangwa River.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Seasonal Shores - Strap in for a thrilling ride as Lizzie travels by air, land, and sea to meet Alaskan wildlife and visit the world's remotest corners. Eavesdrop on underwater Arctic residents with scientists, dine with polar bears, and scavenge with bald eagles.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Wild West - Trek through the Canadian rainforest, look up at dizzying redwood trees, and explore giant kelp forests with Lizzie as she experiences the wild west coast of North America. Cross paths with wolves and bears while salmon travel upstream to lay eggs.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: From Cloud to Coast - Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the island's forests.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Tale of Two Penguins - At the water's edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. It's time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Get chills as winter descends, slowing down life on the bustling reef. Meander with reef sharks and octopuses, visit a coral oasis atop an old shipwreck, and spot a banded snake eel's talent for identity theft when it disguises itself as a predator.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Wilds of Winter - Endure winter and early spring on the west coast, where animals eke out a chilly existence. Watch red deer battle on windswept Inishvickillane, welcome seal pups amid howling storms on the Inishkea islands, and view the return of the basking sharks.

programme.desc: The Wild West - Trek through the Canadian rainforest, look up at dizzying redwood trees, and explore giant kelp forests with Lizzie as she experiences the wild west coast of North America. Cross paths with wolves and bears while salmon travel upstream to lay eggs.

programme.title: Animal Senses S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hearing - Sound waves are produced by movement. Animals have evolved organs to detect those sound waves in the air or water to perceive movements in their environment. These are some of the animals that have mastered the sense of hearing.

programme.title: Arabian Seas S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Carnivores of the Coral Garden - The seas are alive with carnivores. Meet the sharks and rays who patrol the coral reefs, hunting down their prey. Learn about toxic fish who disguise themselves to ambush the unwary, and armoured predators who devour vulnerable targets.

programme.title: Secret Life Of The Tasmanian Devil S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Devils - For Tasmanian devils, dominance is the name of the game during mating season. Meet males who fight for the right to pass on their genes, and learn about the violent, noisy etiquette of these carnivorous marsupials' mealtime.

programme.title: Guardians Of The Wild S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Mission Black Rhino - It's a critical time for two black rhinos in Zambia. Four year old female Apson and fourteen year old bull Kango are at the core of a complex relocation mission that's part of a grand plan to save a species.

programme.title: Guardians Of The Wild S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Carnivore Rescue - Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africa's apex predators.

programme.title: Wild Crusades S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Search for the Secret Bear - The forests of Yala National Park are home to the enigmatic sloth bear. Shy by nature, this animal is seldom seen and rarely filmed. Join a team of wildlife filmmakers as they reveal this mysterious bear's life and behaviour as never seen before.

programme.title: Wild Crusades S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Elephant Dilemma - There's a new arrival at the Elephant Transit Home: a sick elephant calf abandoned near a reserve, another victim in the battle for space between humans and elephants. Study the innovative efforts to end this conflict, led by Dr. Pruthu Fernando.

programme.title: Wild Crusades S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Monkey Diaries - Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. And they are at the heart of the longest primate research project ever undertaken. Dr Wolfgang Dittus is on a quest to understand their complex society.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Queen of Yala - The shadowy forests of Yala National Park are the perfect hideout for secretive leopards. It's time for one young female, Asha, to strike out alone. Join her as she fights for her own territory, finds a mate, and becomes a mother.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Loka the Baby Elephant - Every year, the biggest elephant congregation in Asia occurs in Minneriya National Park. Here in this sacred place, baby Loka is born. Watch as he learns to suckle, swim and handle his trunk among the mle of giants that make up his family.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Lake Hunters - Sri Lanka's lowlands are dotted with thousands of seemingly peaceful lakes, but don't be fooled, this is the realm of the mugger crocodile. Muggers are hunters from day one. Watch as these supreme predators compete with each other in the fierce heat.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Web of Life - A manmade lake in Minneriya National Park supports the largest concentration of elephants in Asia. Follow a young male who has reached a turning point toward adulthood. In the rainforest, jungles teem with a variety of bizarre species of insects.

programme.title: Island Of The Monsoon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: From Cloud to Coast - Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the island's forests.

programme.title: How The Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: Tap into one of the least understood areas of animal science: sleep. Check out adaptations made by the most extreme snoozers on Earth, from tiny bees who doze for 20 hours a day to enormous elephants who survive on just two precious hours of rest.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the region's dark side.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Water Worlds - Wade into wetlands, where trees and water meet to nurture new life. Dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary where a curious band of aquatic misfits hides out, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Mountains - Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock. Tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy, and watch an aromatic tree bring together blossom and possum in a moonlit tryst.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Boreal - Travel to the Arctic for a peek at the brutal challenges of life in the boreal forest, then admire some stellar animal adaptations. Witness a secret reindeer superpower, navigate a rodent labyrinth of snow, and learn why moose are gourmets at heart.

programme.title: Secrets Of The Enchanted Forests S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Extreme - Learn how plants and animals tough it out in some of the driest terrain Earth has to offer. Run across thirsty trees that act as elephant signposts, see insects team up with plants for a chance at life, and get insight into natural chemical warfare.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Hidden Retreats - Some truly remarkable and hidden retreats in Canada, Iceland, Sweden and the UK.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show S31 Ep8
programme.desc: Series 31, Episode 8 - Together on Graham's sofa tonight: Hollywood star Michael Fassbender, in football comedy "Next Goal Wins" and action thriller "The Killer"; comedy legend Jennifer Saunders, starring in "Peter Pan" at the London Palladium; "Back to Life" star Daisy Haggard, in new BBC drama "Boat Story"; and pop supergroup Take That, who chat and perform their current single "Windows".

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Nigella champions the much-maligned bacon of the sea, the anchovy, which she uses to create an elixir to accompany seared steak or crisp, red chicory.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep3
programme.desc: Bread Week - The remaining bakers have a lot to prove as they put their own twist on a classic Italian focaccia, make a Greek-inspired snack and create ambitious designs in milk bread.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Hidden Retreats - Some truly remarkable and hidden retreats in Canada, Iceland, Sweden and the UK.

programme.title: The Great Home Transformation S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Series 1, Episode 2 - In Swansea, Emma and Nick help nurse Lombe and her scientist husband Gregory transform their cramped three-bed semi into a much-needed tranquil and spacious home.

programme.title: Jamie's 5 Ingredient Mediterranean Meals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: This time, Jamie's dressing a salad in a way you've never seen before... with a crown of cheese! He's got a speedy, tasty twist on your Sunday roast that keeps it all in one pan; and puts store-cupboard essentials centre stage in two fabulous family meals that are made in minutes. Finally, YouTube sensation Alex Anouz shares his fabulous 5-ingredient take on a French classic.

programme.title: The World's Most Secret Hotels S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Hidden Retreats - Some truly remarkable and hidden retreats in Canada, Iceland, Sweden and the UK.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A New Diverse Cuisine - Rachel visits Malmo, and the multicultural feel of the city gives her inspiration to make a Swedish green shakshuka. For dessert, Rachel prepares very tasty chocolate oat cookies.

programme.title: Nisha Katona's Home Kitchen S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Nisha Katona is cooking a Bengali stuffed fish in banana leaves, a thyme and apple cake for dessert and a stunning roast rib of beef with some spiced cumin green beans.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee S8 Ep8
programme.desc: Series 8, Episode 8 - The quarter-finalists go back to the 1930s to make women's sailor trousers. They also turn men's shirts into 1930s blouses and fit glamorous bias-cut evening gowns.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S6 Ep4
programme.desc: Maida Vale and Ormskirk - George returns to a grand Victorian villa in Ormskirk to tackle the giant kitchen and utility area, and visits a Victorian flat in London that has seen better days.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S8 Ep6
programme.desc: Series 8, Episode 6 - The teams make savoury Paris-Brest and delectable savarin, before creating a celebration St Honor to serve 150 people. Who has the patience of a saint to secure a spot in the final six?

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Future Food Stars S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Series 2, Episode 1 - Gordon invites 12 food and drink entrepreneurs to Glenapp Castle in Scotland, where he challenges them to create banquets celebrating his homeland. Can they meet his exacting standards?

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee S8 Ep8
programme.desc: Series 8, Episode 8 - The quarter-finalists go back to the 1930s to make women's sailor trousers. They also turn men's shirts into 1930s blouses and fit glamorous bias-cut evening gowns.

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Amanda and Alan aim to transform the courtyard into a Mediterranean oasis. Alan delves into Sicily's famous art scene, while Amanda tackles the building's damaged exterior.

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Alan has concerns over Amanda's taste as she aims to bring a slice of Hollywood to Sicily in the master bedroom with a banana leaf-themed boudoir.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee S8 Ep8
programme.desc: Series 8, Episode 8 - The quarter-finalists go back to the 1930s to make women's sailor trousers. They also turn men's shirts into 1930s blouses and fit glamorous bias-cut evening gowns.

programme.title: Donal Skehan: Home Cook S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Donal shares more delicious dishes; speedy teriyaki salmon with fluffy rice and greens, comforting herby sausage meatballs with pasta and golden oven baked chicken shawarma flatbreads.

programme.title: Amanda and Alan's Italian Job S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Alan takes charge of a bedroom, but doubt sets in as Amanda struggles with his vision. To nail his 'rustic chic' look, Alan visits designer Marie at her 300-year-old palazzo.

programme.desc: The Last Guardian - In order to earn the fire whip, Po and Blade have to get themselves and Rukhmini out of a lost city with no exits, but Rukhimis not exactly who she says she is. Our villains alliance shatters when Colin realizes the weasels are mages with magical powers, and he leaves Klaus gravely injured.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep8
programme.desc: A Thread In The Dark - Klaus is injured and Verucas mage powers are not working, stifled by her time in prison. They encounter a dangerous village and Veruca reconnects with her abilities in time to save Klaus, but the two are soon captured by Po and Blade, who are unaware of Verucas rekindled powers.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep7

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep8

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse Ep7
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Dollhouse - When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse Ep8
programme.desc: Game Show - Its Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the butt xylophone couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Princess Peppa - Granny and Grandpa Pig come for a dinner party with Mummy and Daddy Pig. Peppa and George are too tired to go to bed, until they are told a story.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep228
programme.desc: Zoe Zebra, the Postman's Daughter - Mr. Zebra the Postman gets help from his daughter Zo. Zo has a very special letter for Peppa and George; an invitation to her birthday party. The party is fun.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out.

programme.desc: Babysitting - Tim tries to bend all the rules when Terri comes to babysit.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Pups Save an Antarctic Martian / Pups Save the Maze Explorers - Travelling Travis is on another great adventure when he lands in Antarctica but believes he's actually on Mars. // Mr. Porter and Alex go on a sightseeing hike but get trapped inside a huge maze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Pups Save a Waiter-Bot / Pups Stop a Pie-Clone - Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the caf, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable.

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Gym / The Crew Puts On A Construction Show - Coach Karima asks Rubble & Crew to build a gym for the gymnastics show. But when the beam is too high for Lily, it's up to the pups to save the day.//

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep207
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Charger A Super Bed / The Crew Builds A Super Squirrely Whirly Playground - Charger has a problem... he's got too much energy to sleep! Lucky for him, Rubble & Crew knows there's always a construction solution. //

programme.desc: A Dog For Dora / Super Pozole - Dora gets a new puppy that makes her cat Lucky jealous. After he runs away, Dora tracks Lucky down to remind him of how loved he is. /Today is the championship game, but all of Dora's friends have a cold.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. /When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.desc: The Lost Jelly / Coral Dilemma - When a visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby's communication skills are put to the test. //Vigo steals the color from the coral in Carnivore Cove.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep229
programme.desc: Painting - Peppa and George are painting. Daddy shows them how to mix paints and the three of them paint a beautiful picture of a cherry tree. Everything is going very well, until the ducks turn up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep230
programme.desc: Cuckoo Clock - Daddy Pig winds up the old cuckoo clock. When a wooden cuckoo pops out singing Cuckoo!, Peppa thinks it is very funny, but George has missed the whole thing.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231
programme.desc: The Cycle Ride - Peppa and her family are going for a days cycle ride. Peppa loves cycling downhill but shes not so keen on peddling uphill.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep233
programme.desc: Dentist - Peppa and George are at the dentist. Dr Elephant says that Peppa and Georges teeth are lovely and clean. But Georges plastic toy Mr Dinosaur teeth are a bit yellow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep234
programme.desc: Dens - Peppa is playing in the tree-house with the girls, and George and the boys stay in the castle that Grandpa Pig built for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep235
programme.desc: Grandpa's Little Train - Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called Gertrude and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep236
programme.desc: School Bus Trip - Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Smoothie Shop / The Crew Builds A Dino Roof Party - Caf Carl opens up a smoothie shop on the boardwalk! But when the coaster causes coconut chaos, Rubble & Crew know just what to do. //

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep209
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ferris Wheel / The Crew Builds A Farm Animal Yoga Space - Rubble & Crew want to give Grocer Gabriel the best beach day ever... including a ride on a brand new Ferris wheel at the boardwalk! //

programme.title: DORA S03 Ep311
programme.desc: Dora's Song For Papi / Pirate Piggies - Dora travels across the rainforest, creating a song for her dad so they can celebrate Papi-Dora day!/Dora is ready for the Churro Fiesta when the Pirate Piggies eat all the churros.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep241
programme.desc: Pen Pal - Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep242
programme.desc: Granny and Granpa's Attic - Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep243
programme.desc: School Camp - Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pigs boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep248
programme.desc: Bouncy Ball - Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets.She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Bada-Bam / The Barbamartians - Barbabright captured a melody from Mars. The Barbapapas build a rocket to go to the red planet. // While travelling to Mars, the Barbapapas meet a family of Barbamartians.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Boris / Born To Be Wild - The barbababies find a lost baby elephant and secretly look after it. How will Barbapapa and Barbamama react to Boris? // Boris the elephant misses home.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep205
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Hair Salon / The Crew Builds A Colorful Crystal Show - Rubble & Crew build a hair salon just in time for Grandpa Gravel's special photo-until they run into a squirrely shampoo setback! / Motor and Lily make a shiny discovery worth celebrating.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Gym / The Crew Puts On A Construction Show - Coach Karima asks Rubble & Crew to build a gym for the gymnastics show. But when the beam is too high for Lily, it's up to the pups to save the day.//

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Pups and the Beanstalk / Pups Save the Turbots - Rubble decides to nap under a tree at Farmer Yumis when suddenly Adventure Bay gets a huge problem - Alex the Giant! // Cap'n Turbot needs to get a picture of a rare bird.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1002
programme.desc: Pups Save a Sloth - Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey. He races the Paw Patrol to find it when it goes missing to cover up his blunder.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Battle - Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Roar - It's the Roar Festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Treasure - Tim, Tommy, Tia and Grandma go on the search for treasure.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Movie - Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep218
programme.desc: The Crew Raises A Runway/ The Crew Builds A Giant Skateboard - When Buttons the deer needs to cross the Builder Cove airport's runway, Rubble & Crew know just what to build // Rubble & Crew build a supersized skateboard for Auntie Crane and River's show.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Wonky Wishing Wand / Bip Bip's Big Show - Big Red Chicken's magic goes wonky and not only shrinks himself, but causes wacky things to happen throughout the rainforest. Dora has to fix it! //

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Flying Robot Rescue - When Crusher's robot sends Crusher and Pickle far-far away, it's up to Robot Blaze and Robot Sparkle to rescue them using coding!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paper Landscapes / Cowgirl - Barbamama and Barbapapa are surprised to see more and more billboards on the road. // Barbalala dreams of becoming a cowgirl and Barbidou is determined to help her.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Innovation Melting Pot / Make Up Your Mind Barbazoo - The Barbababies want to invent like Leonardo da Vinci. // The Barbababies must choose between going to the pool or going for a bike ride.

programme.desc: Roar - It's the Roar Festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town.

programme.desc: Treasure - Tim, Tommy, Tia and Grandma go on the search for treasure.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Movie - Tim tries to make his own Captain DinoStar movie.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Pups and the Kitty-tastrophe / Pups Save a Train - Ryder and the PAW Patrol rescue a lost kitty from the bay. // Ryder, Rubble, and Rocky call in Chase to help them free Katie and Calis train from a rockslide!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cow - When Farmer Al's truck gets stuck on a broken bridge, it's up to the pups to lower them to safety!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Mini Golf Course/The Crew Builds A Butterfly Garden - When a family of bunnies hops onto the soccer field, Rubble & Crew use their skills to build a new sport... Bunny Ball! // After the pups discover a new kind of butterfly, it flutters away!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Teddy's Playgroup - Peppa brings home a teddy from daycare to look after, but she is worried that he will not have a very exciting time.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Danny's Pirate Party - It is Danny Dog's birthday, and with the help of Granddad Dog and Grandpa Pig the children take part in a pirate treasure hunt.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Mr Potato Comes to Town - All the people in Peppa's town are excited to meet Mr Potato when he comes to open a new sports center.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep238
programme.desc: The baby Piggy - Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chlo and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chlo have a great idea;

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep240
programme.desc: Pretend Friend - Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called Leo Lion. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep69
programme.desc: Toast - The Teletubbies eat lots of Tubby Toast and make a huge pile of crumbs. Luckily, The Noo-Noo is on hand to clean up.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Lizard - Dee encourages a friend to say 'lizard' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Today we see a green lizard, a bright lizard, a long-tailed lizard, a running lizard and a climbing lizard.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep36
programme.desc: Fly with Fly - Fly is on the lookout for a very special flower known as a rainbow flower. But when Fly's adventure takes her a little too far from Pop Paper City, her friends have to find her and bring her home.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Snowdens Ear-mergency - Snowden has lost his pine cone ears. Will Messy and his chums find them in time for his performance in the OKIDO Ice Skating Extravaganza?

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep41
programme.desc: Stickbird - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Relax - In a funny and honest look at modern family life, Bluey, her sister Bingo and her friends use gameplay to integrate the adult world into their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Ladybird's Gameshow - Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Campfire Choir - Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Go Jetters Academy: Ghost Crabs - Glitch takes all the sand from the Academy beach, leaving the local crabs with nowhere to hide from hungry seagulls. Can the Go Jetters repair the beach before it's too late?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Bbq - It's lunchtime on Bluey's deck! But the BBQ needs a salad, so Bingo's relaxing sit-down will have to wait until she finds every colour of capsicum her cousins asked for!

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Bingo - When Bluey has a playdate at Chloe's, Bingo must learn how to play by herself. But all the games she knows need more than one person! Luckily Dad has a problem that needs solving.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep13
programme.desc: Andy and the Baby European Pond Turtle - In this episode, Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to the Danube river in Vienna, Austria on a baby animal mission to help a newly hatched European pond turtle reach water. Along the way, the intrepid team witness the emergence of ten million mayflies.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Mission: Horse Riding - Disability assistance dog Tinks visits Clip-Clop Stables with Charli, where they meet a very tall horse called Mist who is taking Charli for her first ever horse-riding lesson.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep9

programme.desc: Seaweed's Dream Spade - Captain Captain reminds Sandy and Seaweed that it is kit check day, but its seems that Seaweed is missing an essential piece of pirate kit!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep23
programme.desc: The Theatre Badge - Duggee and the squirrels help to put on an amateur dramatic show.

programme.desc: Cave of Crystals, Mexico - Can Glitch be saved from the Cave of Crystals, Mexico before things get too hot to handle?
